definition: variant of 耽擱|耽搁[dan1 ge5]
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility

sentences.english: He is an hour late -- He can have been delayed by fog.
sentences.chinese: 他遲到了一小時，可能由於大霧而擔擱了。

sentences.english: Get busy doing all those things at home that you have been putting off for so long.
sentences.chinese: 擔擱了很長時間的事情趕緊在這周完成吧。

sentences.english: I owe you to apology for the delay.
sentences.chinese: 我爲這次擔擱向你道歉。

sentences.english: If so, does it waste your time?
sentences.chinese: 那樣又會不會擔擱你的時間？

sentences.english: A few minutes' delay may not be a serious matter, but it may have bad results.
sentences.chinese: 擔擱幾分鐘也許是一件小事，但它可能引起不良後果。

sentences.english: Our flight was delayed, owing to the bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 因爲壞氣候，咱們的班機給擔擱了。
